overview:
As the co-founder and technical lead behind Indinero.com, Andy designed and built the first prototype in just 30 days. Andy studied Computer Science at the University of California, Berkeley, where he specialized in algorithms and artificial intelligence. He has since built Indinero’s proprietary machine learning algorithms to help small business owners better understand their finances.

In his early life, he won state and national awards in mathematics and science and graduated from U.C. Berkeley at the age of 18. Prior to Indinero, he was the founder and lead programmer at internshipIN.com, where he built proprietary algorithms to help match students with employers based on interests and compatibility.
